original_prompt:
Diagnose and resolve the following errors, then run a complete code review and update any documentation before committing.

ralph ulw

On the dev server, starting the container results in:

assessor-rest-1 unhealthy
assessor-worker-1 not started
assessor-frontend-1 not started

the rest logs look ok.
the db logs look lok.
the worker starts manually and its logs look ok
the frontend won't start manually and gives this error:

Error response from daemon: failed to set up container networking: driver failed programming external connectivity on endpoint assessor-frontend-1 (0f3dbb20959a08b70c11af0a7e2ea421c56b075b38c02cbf3526c29db75463ad): error while calling RootlessKit PortManager.AddPort(): cannot expose privileged port 80, you can add 'net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start=80' to /etc/sysctl.conf (currently 1024), or set CAP_NET_BIND_SERVICE on rootlesskit binary, or choose a larger port number (>= 1024): listen tcp4 0.0.0.0:80: bind: permission denied
Error: failed to start containers: assessor-frontend-1
